//You got me here mate!!
#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
    int t,n,m;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        cin>>n>>m;
        long long a=1,b=1;
        while(--n)
        {
            a=(a+b)%m;
            b=(a+b)%m;
        }
        cout<<a<<"/"<<b<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
    }
